overview: Our favorite naughty schoolboys return in Volume 3 of Icon Male's hit series Schoolboy Fantasies. Boy next door Brandon Wilde gets a creepy after-school visit from secret stalker Wolf Hudson, while Italian professor Tony Salerno has a secret tryst with hot young student Bryce Acton. Wolf's sweet tooth then craves a taste of hot prep school boy Ethan Slade, while Tony Salerno plays Daddy to pretty hung thing Sam Truitt. Written and directed by Nica Noelle.
tagline: These schoolboys want more than good grades.
title: Schoolboy Fantasies 3
